The terrestriall paradise, or, Happinesse on earth. Written by Robert Crofts R. C. (Robert Crofts)
[114] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper for William Aderton, and are to be sold at his shop in Duck-lane, London : 1639.
Partly in verse. Signatures: [A]¹² ([A]³+chi¹) B-E¹² (-A1-3,5). With an additional title page, engraved: "The terrestriall paradise or Happines on earth. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
